Inline using pair of single dollars signs $f(k) = {n\choose k} p^{k} (1-p)^{n-k}$. Lets see if that works.

This next one is called display style and uses a pair of double dollar signs: $$f(k) = {n\choose k} p^{k} (1-p)^{n-k}$$

Let's go!
